title: Does anyone else feel like they get worse at a Champ the MORE they play them?
body:
I used to sit at an 70% win rate with 3.1 KDA with Ahri...

Lately I can't land a charm to save my life. lel

replies.body:
I feel like that's the case with me too :)
But it also seems that I'm better after not touching the game for some time too.

No, for me it depends on how well i've gone about my day. If I've done nothing but play league all day, most of my games will be shit. If i've gone out, done stuff, feel pretty good, I play a lot better.

Also if it's late at night and i'm munching on my favorite cookies and some mountain dew, I play pretty well.


I've always found I spike hard with champs, playing EXTREMELY well the first match I play with them for the first time (first time playing draven I rekt the enemy team something like 13-2), and then it drastically changes to me getting rekt and then my W/L and playmaking abilities even out after that.

Yes I play with jhin as my main the other day I used to get 7/5/6,12/1/10
And now I get like 3/6/3 and 1/12/3

Depends on when your talking about.

Remember Ahri has had changes to her, these will all affect your specific game.

Also remember the meta is shifting, and thus Ahri is getting somewhat weaker (as with all AP mids.)
No as in I've been spamming Ahri in Solo Q since her changes. I got myself out of Bronze with her. Now ever since SIlver I just haven't been anywhere near as consistent with her as I used to be.
That could be as simple as your opponents are better.
I've been playing pretty bad as of late, I do feel like it's actually all me but I guess I just need to bump myself up to their level lol

Play draven, thats all the advice you will ever need. {{champion:119}} {{item:2044}} 

He is always watching and granting power to the draven mains!
